name: 1010 (itch)
description:
Drag and drop strange shapes onto a square grid to complete rows and achieve the highest score. This puzzle game is great for all ages and works off the idea of tangrams. It works fine on a normal PC, but it is best when played on a touch screen PC. As a small and simple game, this is great if you just want to kill some dead time. It's easy to learn, but hard to master.

Don't want to download it? Go play it over at bottersnike.github.io

Features:

  • Loads of different shapes
  • Drag and drop interface
  • Simple controls

To Do:

  • Add some more shaopes and colours
